snippet: For leaders of the Kremlin, turning 60 is a milestone heavy with history and symbolism, sometimes marked by elaborate ceremony and sometimes not.
abstract: Russians celebrate Pres Vladimir V Putin's 60th birthday, milestone heavy with history and symbolism.
lead_paragraph: For leaders of the Kremlin, turning 60 is a milestone heavy with history and symbolism, sometimes marked by elaborate ceremony and sometimes not.

headline.main: Happy Birthday, Mr. President: Putin Turns 60, and Russians Pay Notice
headline.print_headline: Happy Birthday, Mr. President: Putin Turns 60, and Russians Pay Notice
